Name: Summon of Asmodeus
About the game: * Synopsis A serial abduction case occurs in a small village . It leads the villagers to believe in a rumor that the abducted  ones are to be sacrificed to a certain kind of ritual... Given that a pair of nuns dispatched from a rural church is  reported to be lost in a forest, the Cathedral finally decides to send a battle sister 'Elina' to the forest in order to  bring the incident to a conclusion...... An exploration based action game to prevent an enigmatic ritual  from operating with the help of the divine power. * Control Arrow keys: Move C key: Jump Z key: Close range attack X key: Shoot Hold X key: Skill Hold V key: Recover F key: Inspect Shift key: Dodge ESC key: System Menu * Credits CV: Hiyori Misaki
